description:
What is course about ?

In this courses you will learn quick way of money making via selling websites on Marketplace .Course includes Videos and screencast videos with free zip of themes

I am going to start with domain purchase and hosting setup followed by website setup and then monetizing it ,Basic SEO , Traffic targeting and finally listing it on flippa for sale.

Terminology

Flipper , Website sell

Requirements

Basic knowledge of websites and Internet.

Patience and time to focus on website regularly.

Materials Included

Course include creating amazon affiliate website with zero code knowledge and monetizing it and then selling it . Free WordPress themes ( theme by me)

Course duration

Over 17 lectures ( 10 video lectures , 4 Headtalks and 3 PDF) and 1.5 hours of content!

Learn how to make money by selling websites

Build a Website With Wordpress

Optimization Basic SEO

Make a Website monetized

Sell a Website on a Marketplace

Guidance for safe sale and transfer of website.

What is the target audience?

Useful for startup entrepreneurs , developers and students. Who wants to make extra money.

Why Take this course ?

I sold 5 domains and website and made $17,700 in 45 days on Flippa. I am real life experienced seller. I understand market pretty well. With this course you would be enable to sell websites successfully throughout the life.
title: How to Run a Business by Website Flipping on Flippa
